author: Conor Lally
title: Coronavirus: State’s prison population falls by 248
description: Lockdown has brought falling crime rates, decline in court activity, say gardaí
content:
The Republics prison population has fallen by almost 250 inmates since the Covid-19 crisis began. 
Garda sources say the decline can be mostly put down to falling crime rates due to the restrictions in place to combat the virus and because of the scaling bac… [+3589 chars]
